welcome_message_body: Welcome to charming Rockland, Canada! Get ready to experience the breathtaking beauty of our coastal town, known for its scenic views and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Rockland has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Gatineau-Ottawa Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Executive Gatineau-Ottawa Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rockcliffe St Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for exclusive use by private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
